name: Gekijou-ban Kyoukai no Kanata -I'll Be Here- Mirai-hen

quotes.show: Gekijou-ban Kyoukai no Kanata -I'll Be Here- Mirai-hen
quotes.quote: Youmu or Spirit Warrior... In the end, none of that really matters. Nor does the question of who you are. All that matters is to be close to the ones you care about.
